msg: Fixed character encoding issue when calling String.getBytes() - needed to specify UTF-8 encoding.

author: awiner
msg: TRINIDAD-24: JspUtils.getEncoding() blindly returns the results of the "enc" parameter, which could have been maliciously tampered with to include additional header values
- Fix a potential security issue with the calendar dialog page (for one)
- Thanks to Blake Sullivan for the fix
